articles.author: Jess Cartner-Morley
articles.title: Gucci show reaffirms Seoul's status as capital of pop culture - The Guardian
articles.description: K-style takes centre stage in collection that draws inspiration from South Korea’s contemporary and traditional dress
articles.content: Baggy jeans, luxury handbags, K-pop heart-throbs and a 14th-century palace starred in a lavish Gucci catwalk show that highlighted Seouls status as a centre of pop culture and a key battleground for … [+8716 chars]
